error.message: Call to deprecated method hashEquals() of class Drupal\Component\Utility\Crypt. Deprecated in drupal:8.8.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use PHP's built-in hash_equals() function instead.
Call to deprecated method hashEquals() of class Drupal\Component\Utility\Crypt. Deprecated in drupal:8.8.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use PHP's built-in hash_equals() function instead.
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to change_pwd_page.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
